The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an abandoned missle silo with bodies all over and what seems like some sort of beast. It's a straight forward creature feature and for the most part it's a lot of fun.
